rows.label: soul28_P0101
rows.name:
The early bird SMASHES
 the worm!

rows.label: soul28_P0102
rows.name:
We need to strike first!
 Close in!

rows.label: soul28_P0103
rows.name:
Break out those melee attacks!
 They'll get your adrenaline going!

rows.label: soul28_P0201
rows.name: Open fire! Now!

rows.label: soul28_P0202
rows.name:
I'll blast them to bits!
 Buff me up!

rows.label: soul28_P0203
rows.name:
Weaken them! I'm gonna
 blow their head off!

rows.label: soul28_P0301
rows.name:
We've got the first strike!
 Take it in close!

rows.label: soul28_P0302
rows.name:
Engaging! Open fire and get
 your adrenaline flowing!

rows.label: soul28_P0303
rows.name:
What are we waiting for?
 Let's see those auras!

rows.label: soul28_P0401
rows.name:
Heal me! We can't afford
 to be sloppy!

rows.label: soul28_P0402
rows.name:
Is anyone else struggling?
 I need some help!

rows.label: soul28_P0403
rows.name:
They're taking their toll on
 me... Can I get a buff?

rows.label: soul28_P0501
rows.name: This is really bad... Heal me!

rows.label: soul28_P0502
rows.name: Oh damn! Please patch me up!

rows.label: soul28_P0503
rows.name:
I'm in deep trouble,
 but we should buff up first!

rows.label: soul28_P0601
rows.name:
I'm done for...
 Hit them hard for me...!

rows.label: soul28_P0602
rows.name:
Keep shooting!
 You can tend to me later...

rows.label: soul28_P0603
rows.name:
Oh god...
 You need an aura...!

rows.label: soul28_P0701
rows.name:
That one was a beauty!
 Don't let up!

rows.label: soul28_P0702
rows.name: Very nice! Follow with gunfire!

rows.label: soul28_P0703
rows.name: Okay! Time to weaken them!

rows.label: soul28_P0801
rows.name:
I took out part of them!
 Move in!

rows.label: soul28_P0802
rows.name:
Are you kidding? Who built
 this clunker? Just shoot it!

rows.label: soul28_P0803
rows.name:
I destroyed it!
 Now cripple that creep!

rows.label: soul28_P0901
rows.name:
It may be huge, but we're
 making a dent. Keep firing!

rows.label: soul28_P0902
rows.name:
Buff up! We can't take any
 chances against these giants!

rows.label: soul28_P0903
rows.name:
It's just massive! Use your
 Overclock to gain the advantage!

rows.label: soul28_P1001
rows.name:
Now we're in business!
 Take the attacks to them!

rows.label: soul28_P1002
rows.name:
How was THAT?
 Now fire away!

rows.label: soul28_P1003
rows.name: That had to hurt! Cripple it!

rows.label: soul28_P1101
rows.name:
Let's be smart about this.
 Use an aura!

rows.label: soul28_P1102
rows.name: Buckle down and use an aura!

rows.label: soul28_P1103
rows.name:
We should play it safe.
 Use a buff!

rows.label: soul28_P1201
rows.name:
I like where this is going!
 Ready for Overclock?

rows.label: soul28_P1202
rows.name:
Let's plow through them!
 Overclock!

rows.label: soul28_P1203
rows.name:
Overclock! Use an aura
 for an advantage!

rows.label: soul28_C0101
rows.name:
This one's finished.
 Move in close and attack!

rows.label: soul28_C0102
rows.name: Okay, next! Guns ready!

rows.label: soul28_C0103
rows.name:
I took one out! Buff up and
 get ready for the next!

rows.label: soul28_C0201
rows.name:
I'm like an acrobat!
 Hook me up with an aura!

rows.label: soul28_C0202
rows.name:
Slowcoach! We've got time to
 buff up!

rows.label: soul28_C0203
rows.name: Not even close! Fire away!

rows.label: soul28_C0301
rows.name:
I've got skills. Now move in
 for kills!

rows.label: soul28_C0302
rows.name:
Thanks for being an easy
 target! Have some bullets!

rows.label: soul28_C0303
rows.name:
Yes! Follow with
 a melee strike!

rows.label: soul28_C0401
rows.name:
Don't worry about the weather!
 We can power through it!

rows.label: soul28_C0402
rows.name:
I don't like this weather...
 Play it safe with an aura!

rows.label: soul28_C0403
rows.name:
Weaken them! Let's turn this
 weather to our advantage!

rows.label: soul28_C0501
rows.name:
My feet are hardly touching
 the ground! Use a buff!

rows.label: soul28_C0502
rows.name: More power!

rows.label: soul28_C0503
rows.name:
They can't even begin to
 keep up. Overclock!

rows.label: soul28_C0601
rows.name:
I appreciate it, but you should
 be in there fighting!

rows.label: soul28_C0602
rows.name:
I'm glad to see you! I'll even
 let you take the next shot!

rows.label: soul28_C0603
rows.name:
Thank you so much! You're
 like my shining aura!

rows.label: soul28_C0701
rows.name:
Thanks. Can you get us
 buffed up?

rows.label: soul28_C0702
rows.name:
So what do I owe you
 for this? More power?

rows.label: soul28_C0703
rows.name:
That's my girl!
 Break out an aura!

rows.label: soul28_C0801
rows.name:
Move in! Attack is
 the best defense!

rows.label: soul28_C0802
rows.name:
I'm not out of the
 game yet. Fire!

rows.label: soul28_C0803
rows.name:
I'll smack them.
 You buff me up!

rows.label: soul28_C0901
rows.name:
They're wide open up here!
 Shoot 'em!

rows.label: soul28_C0902
rows.name:
Hey! I'm up here!
 Blast away!

rows.label: soul28_C0903
rows.name:
Didn't expect us to target you
 from up here, did you?

rows.label: soul28_C1001
rows.name:
I knocked them over!
 Let's put the boot in!

rows.label: soul28_C1002
rows.name: Oopsie daisy! Fire away!

rows.label: soul28_C1003
rows.name:
Clumsy oaf! Let's make this
 weakling even weaker!

rows.label: soul28_C1101
rows.name:
Stunned them! Time for
 some melee practice.

rows.label: soul28_C1102
rows.name:
I put a stop to them.
 Fire at will!

rows.label: soul28_C1103
rows.name:
You need to sit still!
 Cripple them!

rows.label: soul28_C1201
rows.name:
They're not waking up.
 Strike up close!

rows.label: soul28_C1202
rows.name: Pleasant dreams! Fire away!

rows.label: soul28_C1203
rows.name:
I think they need a
 rude awakening!

rows.label: soul28_C1301
rows.name:
Nabbed one!
 Strike them now!

rows.label: soul28_C1302
rows.name:
You like being hugged? No?
 How about being shot?

rows.label: soul28_C1303
rows.name:
I'll hold them. Move in
 and help me out!

rows.label: soul28_C1401
rows.name:
Appendage lost!
 Patch me up!

rows.label: soul28_C1402
rows.name:
Strike back with a melee
 attack! Eye for an eye!

rows.label: soul28_C1403
rows.name:
I can take the punishment.
 Keep shooting!

rows.label: soul28_C1501
rows.name:
No! They got me!
 Heal up and regroup!

rows.label: soul28_C1502
rows.name:
Sorry about the Doll!
 We can power through this!

rows.label: soul28_C1503
rows.name:
Not now! Overclock!
 Turn the tables!

rows.label: soul28_C1601
rows.name:
Fuel's almost out! Help me out
 so we can finish this quickly!

rows.label: soul28_C1602
rows.name:
This clunker is about to
 peter out. I need a fix!

rows.label: soul28_C1603
rows.name:
Can I get a refill before I run
 out of fuel?
